comment:
* A pause listener receives notifications from an animation when the
     * animation is {@link #pause() paused} or {@link #resume() resumed}.
     *
     * @see #addPauseListener(AnimatorPauseListener)

methods.name: void onAnimationPause(@NonNull Animator animation)
methods.comment:
*

Notifies that the animation was paused.

* * @param animation The animaton being paused. * @see #pause()

methods.name: void onAnimationResume(@NonNull Animator animation)
methods.comment:
*

Notifies that the animation was resumed, after being * previously paused.

* * @param animation The animation being resumed. * @see #resume()
